metadata.title: CVE-2023-33952 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A double-free vulnerability was found in handling vmw_buffer_object objectsin the vmwgfx driver in the Linux kernel. This issue occurs due to the lackof validating the existence of an object prior to performing further freeoperations on the object, which may allow a local privileged user toescalate privileges and execute code in the context of the kernel.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
